mapper.insert: insert into date_info(date_id, date_category_code, date_name, date_address, tel, open, end, date_intro, date_img) values (seq_date_info.nextval, #{date_category_code}, #{date_name}, #{date_address}, #{tel}, #{open}, #{end}, #{date_intro}, #{date_img})
mapper.delete: delete from date_info where date_id = #{date_id} and date_category_code = #{date_category_code}
delete from date_info where date_id in ( ${date_id} ) and date_category_code = #{date_category_code}
